```{r setup}
library(phinla)
library(phytools)
library(RRphylo)

set.seed(230045)
## simulated tree
phy <- pbtree(n = 1000, scale = 1, d = 0.2)

L1 <- makeL(phy)[ , -1]
L2 <- make_L(phy)

all.equal(L1, L2)
```
